name: Dog Gone(itch)
description:
A few weeks ago, while digging around your backyard, you — the renowned Detective Doglas — found the bones of the Sherlock Bones, who disappeared from the city half a year ago. With your trusty assistant Max and Bones's old partner Winston, investigate your suspects using the evidence you've gathered and find out the dog behind the murder.-
DEVELOPERSKeana Almario - character and background art, script editing, implementation, project management
Patrick Li - character concepts, script, implementation
Lucas Hitchcock - logo, UI art
